welcome.title: Welcome to Logikids
welcome.subtitle: Start your journey into the exciting world of mathematics and logical thinking!
welcome.personalizedSubtitle: Ready to continue your learning adventure?

startLearning.title: Start Learning
startLearning.description: Choose a subject and begin your learning journey

progress.title: Your Progress
progress.description: See how you're doing and track your achievements

parentalConsent.title: Welcome to LogiKids
parentalConsent.intro: LogiKids uses AI to generate personalized learning tasks for your child.
parentalConsent.aiContent: AI-generated educational content tailored to your child's age and grade
parentalConsent.clientFirst: All data is stored securely on your device. Optional encrypted backups to server only if you enable it.
parentalConsent.compliance: We comply with GDPR and AI Act regulations
parentalConsent.noSharing: No data sharing with third parties
parentalConsent.dataRights: Right to access and delete data at any time
parentalConsent.consentCheckbox: I am a parent/guardian and have read the above information

studentInfo.subtitle: Tell us a bit about yourself to get started
studentInfo.gradeMismatchWarning: Please confirm: You entered age {{age}} and grade {{grade}}. Most {{age}}-year-olds are in grade {{expectedGrade}}. Continue anyway?

account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage your profile and preferences
account.dataInfo: Your data is stored securely on your device. You can export or delete it at any time.
account.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? This cannot be undone.

stats.title: Statistics
stats.greeting: Hi {{name}}, here are your learning statistics!
stats.noTasksYet: You haven't completed any tasks yet. Start solving tasks to see your progress!

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.pageDescription: Select a subject to start learning
subjects.error: Failed to load subjects. Please try again.

concepts.noConcepts: No concepts available for this subject.
concepts.noConceptsForGrade: No concepts available for your grade. Try "Show Advanced Concepts".

prompt.title: Help us personalize your experience!
